cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Hosted by Aviva Solutions, the Kentico User Group Benelux will be in Koudekerk aan den Rijn, Netherlands on Monday December 11th to discuss the Xperience by Kentico roadmap, Azure's OpenAI services, and build and deployment pipelines for Kentico projects.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Kentico User Group Benelux - December 2023 Meetup
cms.contentitemcommondata.ContentItemCommonDataVisualBuilderWidget:
{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"c4aa9b5c-de5e-4dd5-9ae8-c3d21aa22f8f","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"24eeba0a-20a5-4542-85a6-92aa6f75526c","widgets":[{"identifier":"f987183d-3e9e-4ffc-adb7-a20cc3b901c1","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"1ce39297-1ab1-4006-b4a5-6e97409c2233","properties":{"markdown":"Join your fellow Kentico experts, enthusiasts, or anyone who wants to learn about Kentico in Koudekerk aan den Rijn, Netherlands on Monday December 11th.

The group will be covering a variety of topics including sessions for Xperience by Kentico's roadmap, Azure's OpenAI services, and build and deployment pipelines for Kentico projects.

Location: 50-B Dorpsstraat 2396 HC Koudekerk aan den Rijn Netherlands

cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: Hosted by Aviva Solutions, the Kentico User Group Benelux will be in Koudekerk aan den Rijn, Netherlands on Monday December 11th to discuss the Xperience by Kentico roadmap, Azure's OpenAI services, and build and deployment pipelines for Kentico projects.
